title: Video: Jamie Isaac – Hollow Words (Live)
content:
It’s been a while since we last checked in with moody London songwriter Jamie Isaac, and I’m taking that radio silence as a sign of more material in the works.

This live take of Hollow Words, comes accompanied by visuals shot over the course of last year, and just like the track itself are minimal and ever-so-mysterious. Having yet to put out a physical release, surely 2013 is the year that Jamie Isaac moves out of the bedroom and onto the big stage.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
